Are you ready to feel the wind on your face by floating in the sky like me, and embark on a new adventure with underground cities with a distinct history? ✈️

data.text:
Dear Guest,

From 15 May 2021, passengers travelling from the following countries will not be required to submit a PCR test result.

You can benefit from the Memorial Check-up Package for BolBol Members for only 1200 TL instead of 5200 TL, as well as receiving 500 BolPoints.
Join to Pegasus BolBol and collect your BolPoints to fly more.

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text:
❗️Important Announcement About Austria Flights❗️
All passengers who travel to Austria are required to wear an FFP2 class mask starting from 25 January 2021. Children between 6 and 14 years old can use one of the other masks.
The requirement does not apply to passengers aged 11 years or less. Those who don’t submit negative test result will not be accepted to the flights.

According to the measures taken by the official authorities, passengers having a flight to UK are required to submit a negative PCR or LAMP test result done within 0-72 hours before departure, starting from 7am(Turkey Time) on 15/01/2021.
The requirement does not apply to passengers aged 12 years or less. Requirement will apply until 17/01/2021. Those who don’t submit negative test result will not be accepted to the flights.

According to the measures taken by The Danish Ministry of Transport; passengers are required to submit a negative PCR or antigen test result done within 0-24 hours before departure, starting from 09/01/2021 at 17:00.

urls.description: İhtiyaçlarına ve uçuş alışkanlıklarına uygun fiyat seçeneklerine göz at, bütçene en uygun uçak biletini al, sen de ucuza uçmanın keyfini yaşa! Hadi hemen tıkla!

data.text: Transit passengers will be accepted to the flight according to the rules of the final destination country. Please visit https://t.co/azHsPM4PNG for the country acceptance requirements. ✈️
According to the measures taken by the official authorities, only transit passengers from the UK having a connecting flight through Turkey to other countries will be accepted to the flight.
